more.requirement: • Bartender will normally work 48 hours each week. Normal working hours and days will be determined by the Restaurant Manager which will be informed to him or her on the commencement of, and during, his or her employment. Bartender may be required to work such additional hours as may be necessary for the proper performance of your duties. • Candidate must possess at least a Certificate/Diploma, College Degree, Bachelor's Degree, Hospitality/Tourism/Hotel Management or equivalent. • Required language(s): English • At least 1 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. • Preferably Junior Staffs specializing in Food/Beverage/Restaurant Service or equivalent. • Full-Time position(s) available.
more.description: 1. Ensure that all customers are educated on our products and services 2. Maintain the highest quality, consistent product standards 3. Follow all Company’s drink recipes and procedures 4. Develop an understanding of wine and spirit’s regions and the various differences in flavor and mixtures 5. Maintain and enhance personal knowledge on the various types of cocktails and wines 6. Proficiently prepare alcohol or non-alcohol beverages 7. Greets all customers with friendly and personalized manner and develop a rapport with customers by learning their names, favorite drinks and food items 8. Verbally receive and repeat customers’ orders carefully 9. Serve and present alcohol and non – alcohol beverages quickly and efficiently according to the Company’s standard 10. Report all customer complaints to Assistant Restaurant Manager 11. Respond proactively to prevent customer service situations 12. Answer telephone in a friendly and professional manner including, but not limited to, giving store greeting, directions to store location, and receiving and filling customer orders 13. Answer customer questions regarding coffee blends, preparation, and product freshness 14. Deliver and maintain excellent, warm and friendly service at all times 15. Keep up to date with current promotions and new products in order to make customers aware of offers on our great food and drink range 16. Communicate with customers to ensure that they are satisfied with our products and service 17. Control and keep track on beverage inventory 18. Always adhere to all company policies and procedures and licensing laws 19. Be involved and contribute at team meetings 20. Carry out instructions given by the management team.
